mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huanzhe_name as huanzheName ,a.huanzhe_phone as huanzhePhone ,a.huanzhe_id_number as huanzheIdNumber ,a.huanzhe_photo as huanzhePhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.huanzhe_email as huanzheEmail ,a.huanzhe_zhuzhi as huanzheZhuzhi ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huanzhe a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huanzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheName},'%')
and a.huanzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzhePhone},'%')
and a.huanzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.huanzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheEmail},'%')
and a.huanzhe_zhuzhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheZhuzhi},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
